description: As a young boy, he has joined multiple art competitions and won 1st prize in the 2007 USA Art Showcase and 2009 International Year of Astronomy Art and Design Competition. He studied Multi Media Arts at CIIT which started his career as a Digital Artist / Illustrator. Yet, he remained very passionate about creating art in a non-digital process. Today, he has quite a collection of art works portraying all beings that live and thrive on earth.
